questions.question: Over the past two weeks, how often have you felt nervous, anxious, or on edge?
How often have you been unable to stop or control worrying?
Have you experienced excessive worry about different problems and activities?
How often do you have trouble relaxing?
Have you been feeling restless or having difficulty sitting still?
How often do you get easily annoyed or irritable?
Have you experienced fear that something awful might happen?
Do you experience physical symptoms like rapid heartbeat, sweating, or trembling when anxious?

low.title: Low Anxiety Levels
low.description: Your responses suggest minimal anxiety symptoms. You appear to be managing stress well.
low.recommendations: Continue maintaining your current healthy coping strategies. Regular exercise, good sleep habits, and stress management techniques can help maintain your mental well-being.
nextSteps: Monitor any changes in your mental health

medium.title: Moderate Anxiety Levels
medium.description: Your responses indicate moderate anxiety symptoms that may be affecting your daily life.
medium.recommendations: Consider implementing stress reduction techniques and lifestyle changes. If symptoms persist or worsen, consulting with a healthcare professional would be beneficial.
nextSteps: Practice relaxation techniques like deep breathing
Talk to a healthcare provider if symptoms persist
Join a support group or speak with trusted friends/family

high.title: High Anxiety Levels
high.description: Your responses suggest significant anxiety symptoms that may be substantially impacting your daily functioning.
high.recommendations: It's strongly recommended to consult with a mental health professional for proper evaluation and treatment. Professional support can provide you with effective strategies and treatment options.
nextSteps: Schedule an appointment with a mental health professional
Consider crisis resources if you're in immediate distress
Reach out to family, friends, or support groups
Practice grounding techniques during anxiety episodes
